div.h2: Quality Learning Through a System of Continual Improvement
Unlocking the Innate Brilliance in Every Child

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_4_4 tm_pb_column_1 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 col-xl-12 tm_pb_vertical_alligment_start
tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_2_3 tm_pb_column_2 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-8 col-xl-8 tm_pb_vertical_alligment_center

p.span: We transform education by restoring joy and meaning in learning.

p.span: Students leave Ingenium Schools knowing what is meaningful to them and are equipped with the capacity and tools to continually improve themselves and the world around them.

div.class: tm_pb_column tm_pb_column_1_2 tm_pb_column_6 col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-6 col-xl-6 tm_pb_vertical_alligment_center

tm-testi__wrap tm-testi__wrap--perview-1 tm-testi__wrap--shortcode swiper-container tm-testi-slider tm-testi--default

div.p: I was very happy to get to explore the classroom and find the projects and lectures the kids get to explore. Scarlette is constantly telling me about some of new things she learns, so seeing it in person was refreshing. I think some of the topics are more detailed than I would have imagined (like the habitats), but genius to be taught at this time. I loved that the kids are given the oportunities to be independent and own responsibility! It was very encouraging to see the classroom to know where to work on at home with Scarlette. I alsoâ¦

cite.span: Ms. Matt, Barack Obama Charter School ParentÂ

div.p: [Ingenium] is a safe environment and the staff makes you feel welcomedâ¦itâs as if [youâre] working with a family. Â

div.p: The link you just clicked on will take you to our Ingenium Schools district website. To continue, click below. Once there, if you would like to return to the Ingenium Barack Obama Charter website, please visit https://barackobamacharter.org.
